Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: Necoh
Reviews.Content: Rainbow presented large clean rooms, and an excellent location, a 5 minute walking to the metro station with possibilities of taking both the green and red lines. If the service was up to the same level of their facilities, and employees showed a little more will to work, it would be definitely a great hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location. clean rooms. fast customer service”
Reviews.Author: kunal_bagadia
Reviews.Content: I visited hotel on midnight of 24th nov.2011. Due to non availability they upgraded me to suite room with private living room and it was great experience. Free wifi with the room was great. al fahidi metro station is two minute walking by from hotel. and five minute is khalid bin walid station. location of hotel is best. dont prefer to stay on first floor as duringmiddle of night one will hear housekeeping calls..

Reviews.Title: “Nice room but poor services”
Reviews.Author: Nina W
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my fiance for 6 nights in this hotel. While the room was spacious and clean, we did run into some problems with the services offered by the hotel. First, they charge 20dh for internet service, which is fine, but the connection was consistently slow - it would take about 20 minutes to just get to my email account. If I'm paying for internet, I prefer for it to work at least relatively well. We found the hotel staff to be cordial, but generally unhelpful. It was sometimes difficult to make questions understood, and almost always impossible to get a direct answer. The rooftop pool is very small, and a hotel staff member must accompany you to the pool if you wish to use it, and then stay there. My fiance and I wanted to go up to swim one evening, a request which was begrudgingly met by the reception desk, as this means that one of them must leave their work to babysit you, then stand there on the side while you swim - you can see where this could get awkward. It just didn't make for a very enjoyable (and certainly not romantic) pool experience, since you have someone standing there staring at you whole clearly just wants you to leave. No balconies and the bathroom was a little bit run-down, but I can say that everything was clean - the bed had a washable duvet cover, which is an important feature at least to me. Good location, and close to the metro. Overall, the hotel was in a great location, but there were too many small annoyances for us to consider staying here again. There must be better places in Dubai at this price point.

Reviews.Title: “Yo Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Bhuwannp
Reviews.Content: I had stayed in this hotel from 8 to 12 november 2011 and had a pleasant stay in the heart of amazing Dubai city hotel is just amazing with good big room and also economy friendly with budget rate

Reviews.Title: “insects in the room”
Reviews.Author: ozcan k
Reviews.Content: I have stayed 4 nights in this hotel.There were a lot of insects (some of them small but most of them big) in the room.the room was not clean.Bed sheets were dirty.We changed them but the new ones were also dirty.I think they were so old.The room needs refurnished.the breakfast was poorly.The location was good.You may go everywhere by metro.You may buy everything from the supermarket.Staf was good and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Brand New”
Reviews.Author: AG4E
Reviews.Content: Since the hotel is brand new, everything was in order and working right, helping the place stand out other three-star hotels nearby. The rooms were clean and all the amenities were in order. The shower flow was perfect. Although the hotel was very small, compared to most other hotels I’ve been to, the rooms were spacious enough. The reasonable rates were the best part and the food was also good. However, the hotel’s very small pool and gym is not something you could rely on for workouts. As per the location I personally prefer hotels near the big malls, like “Mall of the Emirates” and “The Dubai Mall”.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Siddharth_G
Reviews.Content: - I stayed for 6 nights - Good location. 5 mins walking distance from Burjuman & the metro. 10 mins by taxi to Shk Zayed - Check-in took approx. 20-25 mins, however, no reasons to complain really - Ever smiling and hospitable hotel staff. Accomodating and quick to manage requests (Eg: Iron boards, quick laundry) - Clean rooms and property. Gym and simming pool exist, however, I did not use them - The bed in my room was a double bed but relatively small. However, still comfortable and cosy enough to sleep at night - Internet needs to be purchased @ AED 20 for 24 hrs. Found it reasonable. Good speed and no connectivity problems - Safe. (Can leave laptops, currency in the safe in the rooms). Just let the Manager in charge know. - I only had brkfast which was predominantly Indian. Lot of variety to choose from. I enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: “loved the budget and compact hotel”
Reviews.Author: tanuuj
Reviews.Content: good budget and centralised hotel in the heart of dubai city and visitor need not run for food and other requirements, the rooms are compact and well decored with good food and its variety keeping in mind the indian requirements. due to centrally located and reach shopping malls and other tourist places with in reach and proximity to metro and dowh ship

Reviews.Title: “Value for MOney”
Reviews.Author: VRNP
Reviews.Content: Was on a short business trip. found the staff very friendly. The room was spacious and clean . Though the hotel is located in a busy and slightly noisy locality, travelling to various places was convenient .

HotelInfo.Name: Rainbow Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Bank Street | P.O.Box: 6283, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
